overview: Angela, an elegant young woman, spends his nights fantasizing about her neighbor, the sensual Anna Maria, a fortune teller to bewitching charm. One evening, Angela finds Anna Maria's body savagely mutilated. In shock, she accidentally breaks the crystal ball of the latter. A crystal that has the real ability to read the future. But will she use her new gift to escape the violent death which has been promised?
title: Blackaria
